settings.heading: Full Time Student Program
settings.row_content:
Drop your pup off at school! This new service gives us the opportunity to give our community a safe, clean & trustworthy place to send their dogs for a full day of structured socialization, obedience & enrichment. Our new facility offers many new amenities such as multiple socialization areas, all levels of distraction for proofing your pups skills, a stream to adventure through, 4 acres of trails to hike & much more!


Each pup will relax in their own kennel suite to enjoy any down time, snack/lunch time, & water breaks.


This service requires owners to pick up & drop off their pups at
our facility. There is a two day minimum. There is a cancellation fee
for less than 24 hours notice.

Drop Off Times:7 - 9amPick Up Times:4 - 6pmOne day:$4810 Day Package:$480

*** If you have 2 pups & they can share a kennel, itâ€™s only $20 per second dog!

settings.plaintext: Please don't forget to sign up for PetExec! This system will allow for us to have all of your pups info right at our fingertips regardless of which location we are at!
